snippet: The Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom will not need surgery for a stress fracture in his left hind leg, which is causing him to miss the $10 million Dubai World Cup on March 31.
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom will not need surgery for a stress fracture in his left hind leg, which is causing him to miss the $10 million Dubai World Cup on March 31.

headline.seo: Kentucky Derby Winner Animal Kingdom Won’t Need Surgery
